summary: This bill, H.R. 3014, aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code, which governs Veterans Affairs. It seeks to expand the Secretary of Veterans Affairs' authority to provide grants to organizations assisting homeless veterans. The bill specifically focuses on expanding the types of assistance these grants can fund, including helping veterans access benefits, and coordinating other support services from various levels of government and private organizations. The bill also includes criteria for awarding these grants, including for alteration of existing facilities for permanent housing.
